title: PETITION: FINISH THE DUNKMASTER DARIUS LOGIN SCREEN

embed.description: GET DUNKED! This was planned to be a login screen for the Dunkmaster Darius skin for League of Legends. Due to limited space in the release schedule we stopped production on it and the screen never quite made it to completion - but it was a ton of fun to work on!

body: Today I came across what was to be a login screen for Dunkmaster Darius but for some reason was cancelled due to a tight schedule. As it is already awesome enough, I think Riot should at least complete it and maybe release it along with a bunch of other basketball themed skins?

replies.body: should also make the ball bounce with the beat of the music. it triggers me that it doesn't.
it's bouncing in 3/4 time while the music is 4/4
OMG YES! {{champion:122}} Will be so happy!
Too bad this was 4 months ago :(
Cmon rito no one liked the star guardian login screen release this and I will buy dunkmaster darius
U can also release some new basketball skins and put them all together like star guardian's that would be so cool. It's very disappointing that u have only one basketball skin

What people don't get is, that if they finish the login screen, they have to use money they could use oterwise. I like the login screen, but there is no need to finish it. They better spend their time on new login screens and stuff.
